00038 #include "MeshTransform.hpp"
00039 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"
00040 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00041 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00043 namespace MESQUITE_NS {

00045   MeshTransform::~MeshTransform() {}
00046   
00050   double MeshTransform::loop_over_mesh( Mesh* mesh,
00051                                         MeshDomain* ,
00052                                         const Settings*,
00053                                         MsqError &err )
00054   {
00055     std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> handle_list;
00056     mesh->get_all_vertices( handle_list, err );
00057     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00058       return 1.0;
00059     
00060     std::vector<bool> fixed(1);
00061     MsqVertex vertex;
00062     std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::const_iterator iter;
00063     for (iter = handle_list.begin(); iter != handle_list.end(); ++iter)
00064     {
00065       mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( &*iter, &vertex, 1, err );
00066       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00067         return 1.0;
00068       
00069       if (skipFixed) {
00070         mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( &*iter, fixed, 1, err );
00071         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00072           return 1.0;
00073         if (fixed.front())
00074           continue;
00075       }
00076       
00077       vertex = mMat * vertex + mVec;
00078       
00079       mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( *iter, vertex, err );
00080       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00081         return 1.0;
00082     }
00083 
00084     return 0.0;
00085   }
00086   
00087   
00088   void MeshTransform::add_translation( const Vector3D& offset )
00089     { mVec += offset; }
00090   
00091   void MeshTransform::add_rotation( const Vector3D& axis, double radians )
00092     {
00093       const double c = cos(radians);
00094       const double s = sin(radians);
00095       const Vector3D a = axis/axis.length();
00096       const Matrix3D m1(    c,   -a[2]*s, a[1]*s,
00097                           a[2]*s,   c,   -a[0]*s,
00098                          -a[1]*s, a[0]*s,   c    );
00099       Matrix3D m2;
00100       m2.outer_product(a,a);
00101       Matrix3D rot = m1 + (1.0 - c) * m2;
00102       mMat = rot * mMat;
00103       mVec = rot * mVec;
00104     }
00105   
00106   void MeshTransform::add_scale( double factor )
00107     { add_scale( Vector3D(factor) ); } 
00108   
00109   void MeshTransform::add_scale( const Vector3D& f )
00110     {
00111       for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00112         mVec[i] *= f[i];
00113         mMat[i][0] *= f[i];
00114         mMat[i][1] *= f[i];
00115         mMat[i][2] *= f[i];
00116       }
00117     }

00121                                    const Settings* ,
00122                                    MsqError&  )

00124     }
